thread.section_title: Hilton London Angel Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best welcome
thread.title_full: Best welcome - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Encinke1
title: Best welcome
text: We stayed at Hilton Angel Islington one night before flying out from London. Laszlo from reception made our short stay very special. We would like to thank him because he was looking after us and also he is a very good example of Hilton values. The hotel nice with a very good location. Breakfast staff were very efficient as well. Everybody was very nice and friendly with us. Room was amazing I can not wish for myself a better stay. Well done Hilton London Angel.
